meanings.definition: A popular trend in clothing or style.
meanings.sent1: The latest fashions include bright colors and bold patterns.
meanings.sent2: People often follow fashions to stay stylish and trendy.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her cat had unique fashions with its mismatched socks.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, fashions can change rapidly from season to season.
meanings.sent5: The fashion show displayed a variety of fashions, from elegant gowns to casual wear.

meanings.definition: To make or shape something in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: She fashions her hair into a neat bun every morning.
meanings.sent2: Artists often fashion sculptures out of clay or stone.
meanings.sent3: He tried to fashion a makeshift umbrella out of a large leaf during the sudden rain.
meanings.sent4: The chef skillfully fashioned the dough into intricate shapes for the pastries.
meanings.sent5: Using recycled materials, she fashioned a unique piece of jewelry for her friend.

meanings.definition: To form or develop something in a specific manner.
meanings.sent1: She fashions a plan to tackle the project efficiently.
meanings.sent2: Over time, the artist fashions his skills through practice and dedication.
meanings.sent3: The team fashions a new strategy to improve their performance in the game.
meanings.sent4: He fashions a friendship with his neighbor by helping with yard work.
meanings.sent5: The architect fashions a blueprint to guide the construction of the new building.
